name: Quick Seo
author: Rupesh Dinkar Gharat

sections.description:
Quick Search engine optimization (SEO) can bring a tremendous amount of high-intent traffic to your website (people who are actually in the process of searching for things
Quick seo allows you to gain better result in search engines.you can upload:-
* tilte tag
* description tag
* canonical
* publisher tag
* author tag
* robots.txt
* xml sitemap
* google analytics
* additional header script and style
* google and bing verification tag
* social icon
* google plus button

Thank You

Thank you trying this plugin!
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin and extract the files
  2. Upload to your wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Check the “Quick Seo” Tab created by this plugins for setup.
sections.faq:
xml sitemap showing error?

You should upload code starting with xml tag

social icon not appearing?

put [social] shortcode to have social icon on page or widget
